Fully functional LemonSqueezy store template made with daisyUI

Made with daisyUI and Next.js 15

Add your LemonSqueezy API key to the env file, add custom data for your products and your online store will be ready in less than 5 minutes!

This template receives your simple list of products coming from the LemonSqueezy API, adds your custom data and attributes to the products and generates a functional online store with all the standard online store capabilities you need.

Including Homepage, collections page with filter and sort, product page with image gallery, zoom, custom attributes, variant links, related product suggestions and more.

**Fully functional LemonSqueezy store template made with daisyUI**

Made with daisyUI and Next.js 15

Add your **LemonSqueezy API key** to the env file, add custom data for your products and your online store will be ready in **less than 5 minutes**!

This template receives your simple list of products coming from the LemonSqueezy API, adds your custom data and attributes to the products and generates a functional online store with all the standard online store capabilities you need.

Including Homepage, collections page with filter and sort, product page with image gallery, zoom, custom attributes, variant links, related product suggestions and more.
Can I use this template without Lemon Squeezy?

If the Lemon Squeezy API key is not provided, the data will come from the local JSON file. So you can use the template without Lemon Squeezy, using a static JSON file, and for checkout and payment you can use your own solution.

Save thousands of hours by avoiding the time consuming task of creating all the components and variants.

After half a year of development, The Official daisyUI Figma Library is now available for designers in Figma!
This fully tokenized Figma file includes all daisyUI components, theme colors, variables and variants, with regular updates.
A game-changer for designers and developers to use the same design system in both Figma and in CSS.
Invitation to read-only shared file (for free Figma users)
License limit (Library can be shared internally)
Advanced token management using Token Studio
